Package org.application.students

Class StudentsService

java.lang.Object
org.application.students.StudentsService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStudentsService
public class StudentsService extends Object implements IStudentsService
Represents a service class for managing Student entities.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public Student addStudent(String name, String registrationNumber, int year, String groupName) throws StudentAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Student with the given name, registration number, year and group name.
      Specified by:
      addStudent in interface IStudentsService
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new Student.
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the new Student.
      year - The year of the new Student.
      groupName - The group name of the new Student.
      Returns:
      The newly created Student.
      Throws:
      StudentAdditionException - If the Student could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided name, registration number, year or group name are invalid.

    • updateStudent

      public Student updateStudent(int studentId, String name, int year) throws StudentUpdateException, ValidationException
      Updates the Student with the given id with the given name and year.
      Specified by:
      updateStudent in interface IStudentsService
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the Student to update.
      name - The new name of the Student.
      year - The new year of the Student.
      Returns:
      The updated Student.
      Throws:
      StudentUpdateException - If the Student could not be updated.
      ValidationException - If the provided name or year are invalid.

    • reassignStudent

      public Student reassignStudent(int studentId, String newGroupName) throws StudentGroupReassignException, RepositoryOperationException, ValidationException
      Reassigns the Student with the given id to the group with the given name.
      Specified by:
      reassignStudent in interface IStudentsService
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the Student to reassign.
      newGroupName - The new group name of the Student.
      Returns:
      The reassigned Student.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupReassignException - If the Student could not be reassigned.
      RepositoryOperationException - If the Student could not be reassigned.
      ValidationException - If the provided group name is invalid.
